channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Former Red Hot Chili Peppers Guitarist Josh Klinghoffer Avoids Jail On Vehicular Manslaughter Charge
item.description: 🎸 Rock on! 🤘 Former RHCP guitarist Josh Klinghoffer escapes jail time in vehicular manslaughter case. Stay safe on the road, friends! #musicnews

item.title: Devendra Banhart plots September tour with Kath Bloom
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to groove with Devendra Banhart and Kath Bloom on tour this September! 🎸 #MusicNews #LiveMusicFun

item.title: Sam Fender Announces Fall 2025 North American Tour Dates
item.description: 🚀 Pack your bags, North America! 🎸 Sam Fender is hitting the road this fall! 🎶 Which city will YOU be rocking out in? 🤘 #SamFenderTourDates

item.title: Drugdealer and Weyes Blood Reunite With New Song and Video “Real Thing”: Watch
item.description: ✨ Dive into dreamy vibes with Drugdealer and Weyes Blood's magical reunion in "Real Thing" music video! 🎶💫 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Whitney Announce North American Tour, Share New Song: Listen
item.description: ✨ Pack your bags, Whitney is hitting the road! 🎶 Listen to their new track for the ultimate road trip vibes. 🚌🎵 #WhitneyTour #NewMusicAlert
